entry.title: Design Thinking
entry.content:
Join us for a discussion about Design Thinking.

This episode will be scheduled for early 2016.

Outline & Show Notes

  • What is Design Thinking?
  • How does it inform the practice of building & operating high velocity organizations?
  • We should do a @foodfightshow about DevOps & Design Thinking with @jeffsussna; clearly several of us are thinking about it!
